channel.title: "ReapR Ltd." (DEVELOPMENT TEAM)
channel.description:
[size=20pt]HIRING TALENTED, GOOD CODERS... Not any cheezy fake![/size] _______________________________________________________________________________________________
[center][size=18pt]ReapR Ltd.[/size][/center]
[center]My MSN is darksatanicblood@hotmail.com[/center] [center][color=navy]
_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_
[center][size=13pt][b]Summery:[/b][/size][/center] [center] [ul][li]Just looking for coders for the following:[/li][/ul] [/center]
Server Tester Website Designer Graphic Designer Client Makers/Coders Server Coders NPCs and Shops Tech Objects Tech
[center][size=13pt][b]Currently:[/b][/size][/center]
Server Testers:
-Open- -Open- -Open- -Open- -Open-
Website Designer:
[color=red]*Owner Reaper[/color] -Open- -Open-
Graphic Designer:
[color=red]*Zanzibar[/color] -Open- -Open-
Client Makers/Coders:
[color=red]*Samuraiblood2[/color] -Open- -Open-
Server Coders: [color=red]*Owner Reaper (me) [s]*Grim Reaper (co-owner)[/s] <-- (quitted) *Zanzibar *Fireninja4000 ( i never seen him... RAWR... wonder if he is still in) [/color]
NPCs and Shops Tech:
-Open- -Open-
Objects Tech:
[color=red]*Owner Reaper[/color] -Open-
[/center]
______________________________________________________________________________________________ [b][size=20pt]HURRY BEFORE SPOTS GET FULLED[/size][/b]
______________________________________________________________________________________________
Please use the following format for an application: [code]What is/are your in-game(s) username(s): How long can you be on daily: What experience do you have with the position you are applying for: If the previous question was answered, please state proof: What position are you applying for: Are you committed: Why should you be chose for this job: What is you MSN username(to contact you): (If you play there following servers) What your ReapR Isle username: What your ReaperScape username:[/code] ______________________________________________________________________________________________
http://expertcoders.smfforfree3.com/index.php <- This is our help site, join and help it grow!
